Setup for styles at top, scripts at bottom

To setup Jekyll so that posts can have scripts beneath the header and styles added in the footer, amend the head.html and footer.html files in the _includes directory. Add front matter to the jekyll post to provide data that informs what scripts and styles to add.

Finally wrap content in raw, endraw liquid tags to allow double brackets etc. in the content.
